direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods query historical data related to index-linked plans, focusing on different aspects (rebalance vs. redemption).
Both methods access and retrieve detailed information related to index-linked plans.
Both methods involve querying and modifying the state of index-linked plans.
Both methods involve sending requests with similar structures and parameter handling.
Both methods handle exceptions related to plan modifications and status changes.
